Package mockit.asm.methods

package mockit.asm.methods
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    mockit.asm
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    MethodReader
     
    MethodVisitor
    A visitor to visit a Java method, in the following order:
    (BaseWriter.visitAnnotation(String))* (MethodVisitor.visitParameterAnnotation(int, String))* [(visitXInsn | MethodVisitor.visitLabel(Label) | MethodVisitor.visitTryCatchBlock(Label, Label, Label, String) | MethodVisitor.visitLocalVariable(String, String, String, Label, Label, int) | MethodVisitor.visitLineNumber(int, Label))* MethodVisitor.visitMaxStack(int)] BaseWriter.visitEnd().
    MethodWriter
    A MethodVisitor that generates methods in bytecode form.
    WrappingMethodVisitor
    Same as MethodVisitor, except it always wraps a MethodWriter.
